channel.title: Need help cannot connect to my own server
channel.description:
I cant connect to my own server over 12 people are on it but I cant get on. I tried re-downloading server but it didn't work. So can anyone help ? It just says " Connecting to update server ". The source is Runeslay and in the Run.bat file it says Also its a 562.
@echo off start javaw -cp bin;lib/clientlibs.jar client 0 live english game0

item.title: Need help cannot connect to my own server
item.dc:creator: @XSoulX XSoulX
item.description:
@XSoulX wrote:

PLEASEEE!

Read full topic

item.title: Need help cannot connect to my own server
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“usman555, post:15, topic:363496”][quote author=Junes link=topic=459743.msg3363942#msg3363942 date=1286635995]
i do not spoon feed if your not willing to learn where everything is you deserve to not be able to connect to your own server to test bugs your server will die out kthxbai
[/quote]
I agree. You need to know how to fix problems for when/if you get bigger and better, and not always say:

[quote author=XSoulX link=topic=459743.msg3363938#msg3363938 date=1286635902]
teamviewer me and do it?
[/quote][/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: Need help cannot connect to my own server
item.dc:creator: @Junes Junes
item.description:
@Junes wrote:

ok your really getting irritating source and revision? (delta or what?) (317 or what?)

have you changed all your ip’s in your client source to 127.0.0.1 and not just one part cause you may have gui.java egui.java and client.java you need to add 127.0.0.1 to all of them not just 1

NOTE the word MAY
